articles.author: Alexander Ward, Paul McLeary
articles.title: U.S. to discuss missiles in Ukraine and military exercises with Russians, officials say - POLITICO
articles.description: The U.S. will arrive in Europe ready to dial down tensions, but how seriously Russia wants to deal is anyone's guess.
articles.content: The second track will cover military exercises, which have contributed to a dialing up of tensions between Moscow and Washington. Russia has grown the size and intensity of its drills that it runs ne… [+2450 chars]

articles.author: John Molinaro
articles.title: A wizard on the pitch, Insigne poised to take MLS by storm for Toronto FC - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: Fleet of foot with the ability to wield magic with the ball at his feet, Lorenzo Insigne is a top European star. And with a landmark four-year deal completed Saturday, he's poised to have a groundbreaking effect at Toronto FC.
